scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel watch --no-source-maps -d insight/client_resources/vdlx-datagrid -o vdlx-datagrid.js --no-hmr src/js/index.js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/insight/client_resources/**/*.js dist/insight/client_resources/**/*.css dist/insight/client_resources/**/VERSION.txt insight/client_resources/vdlx-datagrid dist/insight/client_resources/*.zip insight/model_resources/*.csv target
scripts.build: npm run version-txt && parcel build --no-cache --no-source-maps -d dist/insight/client_resources/vdlx-datagrid -o vdlx-datagrid.js src/js/index.js
scripts.build:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run version-txt && parcel build --no-cache --no-minify --no-source-maps -d dist/insight/client_resources/vdlx-datagrid-debug -o vdlx-datagrid-debug.js src/js/index.js
scripts.bundle:library: npm run create-target-dir && cd dist/insight/client_resources/ && bestzip ../../../target/vdlx-datagrid.zip vdlx-datagrid/
scripts.bundle:debug-library: npm run create-target-dir && cd dist/insight/client_resources/ && bestzip ../../../target/vdlx-datagrid-debug.zip vdlx-datagrid-debug/
scripts.bundle:app: npm run create-target-dir && cd insight && bestzip ../target/vdlx-datagrid-examples-app.zip *
scripts.vdldoc: npm run create-target-dir && node -r esm scripts/vdldoc/vdldoc-generate.js
